ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Lute in Velk Lab
ygData.msgSnippet: The first thing that comes to my mind since it equips primary is can you equip it secondary as well, and equip a weapon in your primary?  Also, I had assumed
ygData.messageBody:
The first thing that comes to my mind since it equips primary is can you
equip it secondary as well, and equip a weapon in your primary? Also, I had
assumed this was the same illusion as the lvl 44 Garou. If it is, do we get
the huge dex bonus with it?

Mike Mott
BPE COC Support Team
Cherokee 2030
email: mike.j.mott@...
Internal Phone: ETN 639-1946
External Phone: (281) 293-1946
Fax: (281) 293-3051

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kenneth E. Bachman [SMTP:kbachman@...]
> Sent: Friday, December 29, 2000 2:21 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Lute in Velk Lab
>
> I got one the other week, but I've been too focused on getting level 55 to
> test it. I'll try it this
> weekend if I can. It's a lute, so it's a string instrument (I gather). I
> haven't used it for anything
> but the effect though. Two cool things: the werewolf illusion gives a
> STR bonus (unlike some of the
> illusion masks, which give nothing other than the illusion), and it equips
> in the primary hand, so you can
> equip the Lute of the Howler and the off-hand mesmerizing Lute (Melodic
> Truncheon?) and attack with two
> Lutes at once! Dueling banjos! hehe.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
>
> Chris Holden wrote:
>
> > Saw this posted on Eqlizer:

> >
> > Anyone know anything about the mob, level, difficulty, enhancements to
> wind songs?
> >
> > -Ranian
